desc: This book constitutes the refereed proceedings of the 14th National Conference on Man-Machine Speech Communication, NCMMSC 2017, held in Lianyungang, China, in October 2017.

details.authors: Jianhua Tao (Editor),‎ Thomas Fang Zheng (Editor),‎ Changchun Bao (Editor),‎ Dong Wang (Editor),‎ Ya Li (Editor)

title: Man-Machine Speech Communication
